segments.text: Give these sales figures a look . It's pretty depressing . We're way in the red this year . We can't afford to keep going like this for much longer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're right , we need to start making money soon , or at least manage to break even . But I think that the market is slowly beginning to heat up--sales are bound to pick up any time now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Deman is dropping . The problem is our competition . They are monopolizing the market !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we should rethink our marketing strategy to include the possibility that our new line of cosmetics could be a big seller .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's really too early to tell , but a lot is riding on the new products . If we don't do better after the product launch , we may have to go bankrupt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you think it's that serious ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at this numbers and see for yourself . Read'sm and weep .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My goodness , I didn't realize it was that bad .
segments.speaker: S2
